channel.title: Music system (Music tab, unlocking, ect.)

item.title: Music system (Music tab, unlocking, ect.)
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:18, topic:522880”]A question:

Where would you add more songs? In:

        public static final MusicTab[] music = {
                new MusicTab(62, 17023, "Newbie Melody")
        };

Or:

        // song id, swX, swY, neX, neY, name, childId, arraySlot
        public static final Music[] songs = {
                new Music(76, 3200, 3199, 3273, 3302, "Harmony", 4344, 0), // Harmony
                new Music(2, 3200, 3303, 3273, 3353, "Autumn Voyage", 4304, 1), // Autumn Voyage
        };

I plan on adding all the songs and releasing it (of course linking it to this tutorial and saying “this tutorial will show you how to make this usable”).[/quote]

for MusicTab.java it’s:

new MusicTab(songId, buttonId, songName, arraySlot(the unlock boolean in music.java)),

for Music.java it’s:

new Music(song id, swX, swY, neX, neY, name, childId, arraySlot(unlock boolean)),

the swX, swY, neX and neY are the coord’s. Just go to the most south-west point for the region your adding and do ::mypos and do the same for the north-east.
To get the childId, log-in with a 317 deob, go into the music tab and find the song, right click it and it should say “Ok, #” the # is the ChildId.

I’ve already got a lot of song’s added:

[hr]

Fixed the music tab loading (now when you log-in if the song is locked it’s red, if it’s unlocked it’s green).

MusicTab.java

package server.model.content.music;

import server.model.players.Client;

/**
 * 
 * @author Tom
 *
 */

public class MusicTab {

	public MusicTab(int songId, int buttonId, String songName, int array) {
		this.songId = songId;
		this.buttonId = buttonId;
		this.songName = songName;
		this.array = array;
	}
	
	public int songId, buttonId, array;
	public String songName;
	
	public static final MusicTab[] music = {
		new MusicTab(76, 16248, "Harmony", 0),
		new MusicTab(2, 16208, "Autumn Voyage", 1),
		new MusicTab(111, 17051, "Still Night", 2),
		new MusicTab(123, 16196, "Arabian 2", 3),
		new MusicTab(36, 16195, "Arabian", 4),
		new MusicTab(50, 1692, "Alkhaird", 5),
		new MusicTab(47, 6298, "Duel Arena", 6),
		new MusicTab(122, 17044, "Shine", 7),
	
	};
	
	public static void loadMusicTab(Client c) {
		for (int j = 0; j < Music.unlocked.length; j++) {
			for (int i = 0; i < Music.songs.length; i++) {
			if (Music.unlocked[Music.songs[i].array] == true) {
			Music.updateList(c, Music.songs[i].tabId);
			} else {
			c.getPA().sendColor(Music.songs[i].tabId, 255 << 10 |0  << 5 | 0);
			}
		}
	}
} 
	
	public static void handleClick(Client c, int Id) {
		for (int i = 0; i < music.length; i++) {
			if (Id == music[i].buttonId) {
				for (int j = 0; j < Music.songs.length; j++) {
					if (Music.unlocked[music[i].array] == false) {
						c.sendMessage("You need to unlock this song first!");
						return;
					}
				}
			c.getPA().sendFrame126(music[i].songName, 4439);
			c.outStream.createFrame(74);
			c.outStream.writeWordBigEndian(music[i].songId);
			}
		}
	}
	
}

also the sendColor method:

public void sendColor(int id, int color) {
		if (c.getOutStream() != null && c != null) {
			c.outStream.createFrame(122);
			c.outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(id);
			c.outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(color);
		}
	}

item.title: Music system (Music tab, unlocking, ect.)
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

A question:

Where would you add more songs? In:

        public static final MusicTab[] music = {
                new MusicTab(62, 17023, "Newbie Melody")
        };

Or:

        // song id, swX, swY, neX, neY, name, childId, arraySlot
        public static final Music[] songs = {
                new Music(76, 3200, 3199, 3273, 3302, "Harmony", 4344, 0), // Harmony
                new Music(2, 3200, 3303, 3273, 3353, "Autumn Voyage", 4304, 1), // Autumn Voyage
        };

I plan on adding all the songs and releasing it (of course linking it to this tutorial and saying “this tutorial will show you how to make this usable”).

item.title: Music system (Music tab, unlocking, ect.)
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

Fixed the saving.

PlayerSave.java

else if (token.equals("music-unlocked")) {
						for (int j = 0; j < token3.length; j++) {
                            Music.unlocked[j] = Boolean.parseBoolean(token3[j]);
                        }
					}

and

characterfile.write("music-unlocked = ", 0, 17);
			String music = "";
            for(int i = 0; i < Music.unlocked.length; i++)
                music += Music.unlocked[i] + "\t";
            characterfile.write(music);
            characterfile.newLine();

Music.java

package server.model.content.music;

import server.model.players.Client;

/**
 * 
 * @author Tom
 *
 */

public class Music {
	
	public Music(int music, int swX, int swY, int neX, int neY, String name, int tabId, int array) {
		this.music = music;
		this.swX = swX;
		this.swY = swY;
		this.neX = neX;
		this.neY = neY;
		this.name = name;
		this.tabId = tabId;
		this.array = array;
	}

	public int music, swX, swY, neX, neY, tabId, array;
	public String name;
	
	public static void playMusic(Client c) {
		Music song = getMusicId(c);
		if (song == null) {
			c.outStream.createFrame(74);
			c.outStream.writeWordBigEndian(2);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("Autumn Voyage", 4439);
			return;
		}
		c.outStream.createFrame(74);
		c.outStream.writeWordBigEndian(song.music);
		for (int i = 0; i < songs.length; i++) {
			if (unlocked[songs[i].array] == false && which == songs[i]) {
				c.sendMessage("@red@You have unlocked the song: "+songs[i].name);
				unlocked[songs[i].array] = true;
				updateList(c, songs[i].tabId);
			}
			if (which == songs[i])
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(songs[i].name, 4439);
		}
	}
	
	 public static void updateList(Client c, int id) {
	        c.getPA().sendColor(id, 0 << 10 | 255 << 5 | 0);
	    }
	 
	 public static Music which;
	 
	private static Music getMusicId(Client c) {
		int x = c.absX, y = c.absY;
		for (int i = 0; i < songs.length; i++) {
			if (x >= songs[i].swX && x <= songs[i].neX && y >= songs[i].swY && y <= songs[i].neY) {
				which = songs[i];
				return songs[i];
			}
		}
		return null;
	}
	
	public static boolean[] unlocked = {false, false};
	
	
	
	// song id, swX, swY, neX, neY, name, childId, arraySlot
	public static final Music[] songs = {
		new Music(76, 3200, 3199, 3273, 3302, "Harmony", 4344, 0), // Harmony
		new Music(2, 3200, 3303, 3273, 3353, "Autumn Voyage", 4304, 1), // Autumn Voyage
	};
}

item.title: Music system (Music tab, unlocking, ect.)
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

Wrote this up for my 2006 remake and decided to release it. [size=10pt]I do not give anyone permission to re-release/release this anywhere![/size]

Purpose: To add a good music system.
Difficulty: 2/10
Assumed Knowledge: Copy & paste.
Classes Modified: Music.java, MusicTab.java, ChangeRegions.java, ClickingButtons.java, and PlayerSave.java.
Server Base: PI (could be converted easily)

[hr]

Make a new .java file and name it ‘Music’

package server.model.content.music;

import server.model.players.Client;

/**
 * 
 * @author Tom
 *
 */

public class Music {
	
	public Music(int music, int swX, int swY, int neX, int neY, String name, int tabId, int array) {
		this.music = music;
		this.swX = swX;
		this.swY = swY;
		this.neX = neX;
		this.neY = neY;
		this.name = name;
		this.tabId = tabId;
		this.array = array;
	}

	public int music, swX, swY, neX, neY, tabId, array;
	public String name;
	
	public static void playMusic(Client c) {
		Music song = getMusicId(c);
		if (song == null) {
			c.outStream.createFrame(74);
			c.outStream.writeWordBigEndian(2);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("Autumn Voyage", 4439);
			return;
		}
		c.outStream.createFrame(74);
		c.outStream.writeWordBigEndian(song.music);
		for (int i = 0; i < songs.length; i++) {
			if (unlocked[songs[i].array] == false && which == songs[i]) {
				c.sendMessage("@red@You have unlocked the song: "+songs[i].name);
				unlocked[songs[i].array] = true;
				updateList(c, songs[i].tabId);
			}
			if (which == songs[i])
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(songs[i].name, 4439);
		}
	}
	
	 public static void updateList(Client c, int id) {
	        c.getPA().sendColor(id, 0 << 10 | 255 << 5 | 0);
	    }
	 
	 public static Music which;
	 
	private static Music getMusicId(Client c) {
		int x = c.absX, y = c.absY;
		for (int i = 0; i < songs.length; i++) {
			if (x >= songs[i].swX && x <= songs[i].neX && y >= songs[i].swY && y <= songs[i].neY) {
				which = songs[i];
				return songs[i];
			}
		}
		return null;
	}
	
	public static boolean[] unlocked = {false, false};
	
	
	
	// song id, swX, swY, neX, neY, name, childId, arraySlot
	public static final Music[] songs = {
		new Music(76, 3200, 3199, 3273, 3302, "Harmony", 4344, 0), // Harmony
		new Music(2, 3200, 3303, 3273, 3353, "Autumn Voyage", 4304, 1), // Autumn Voyage
	};
}

Now make another .java file and name it ‘MusicTab’. This file handle’s the Music tab ofc. (Clicking on song’s in the music tab)

package server.model.content.music;

import server.model.players.Client;

/**
 * 
 * @author Tom
 *
 */

public class MusicTab {

	public MusicTab(int songId, int buttonId, String songName, int array) {
		this.songId = songId;
		this.buttonId = buttonId;
		this.songName = songName;
		this.array = array;
	}
	
	public int songId, buttonId, array;
	public String songName;
	
	public static final MusicTab[] music = {
		new MusicTab(76, 16248, "Harmony", 0),
		new MusicTab(2, 16208, "Autumn Voyage", 1),
		new MusicTab(111, 17051, "Still Night", 2),
		new MusicTab(123, 16196, "Arabian 2", 3),
		new MusicTab(36, 16195, "Arabian", 4),
		new MusicTab(50, 1692, "Alkhaird", 5),
		new MusicTab(47, 6298, "Duel Arena", 6),
		new MusicTab(122, 17044, "Shine", 7),
	
	};
	
	public static void loadMusicTab(Client c) {
		for (int j = 0; j < Music.unlocked.length; j++) {
			for (int i = 0; i < Music.songs.length; i++) {
			if (Music.unlocked[Music.songs[i].array] == true) {
			Music.updateList(c, Music.songs[i].tabId);
			} else {
			c.getPA().sendColor(Music.songs[i].tabId, 255 << 10 |0  << 5 | 0);
			}
		}
	}
} 
	
	public static void handleClick(Client c, int Id) {
		for (int i = 0; i < music.length; i++) {
			if (Id == music[i].buttonId) {
				for (int j = 0; j < Music.songs.length; j++) {
					if (Music.unlocked[music[i].array] == false) {
						c.sendMessage("You need to unlock this song first!");
						return;
					}
				}
			c.getPA().sendFrame126(music[i].songName, 4439);
			c.outStream.createFrame(74);
			c.outStream.writeWordBigEndian(music[i].songId);
			}
		}
	}
	
}

Alright so now we need to make this all work. Place the following code into ClickingButtons.java.

MusicTab.handleClick(c, actionButtonId);

Ok so now the music tab work’s we need to make the music play when you enter a region. Place the following code into ChangeRegions.java.

Music.playMusic(c);

Now we just need to make the unlocked song’s save. Place the following code into PlayerSave.java.

else if (token.equals("music-unlocked")) {
						for (int j = 0; j < token3.length; j++) {
                            Music.unlocked[j] = Boolean.parseBoolean(token3[j]);
                        }
					}

and

	characterfile.write("music-unlocked = ", 0, 17);
			String music = "";
            for(int i = 0; i < Music.unlocked.length; i++)
                music += Music.unlocked[i] + "\t";
            characterfile.write(music);
            characterfile.newLine();

also the sendColor method:

public void sendColor(int id, int color) {
		if (c.getOutStream() != null && c != null) {
			c.outStream.createFrame(122);
			c.outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(id);
			c.outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(color);
		}
	}
